availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel F. Roberts (Kenton County, KY, farmer and sheriff)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, farmer. Montgomery County, Maryland, native. Son of Henry Roberts and Ellen Roberts. Married to Mary E. Butcher Roberts in Kenton County on February 25, 1856. Father of Ellen "Nellie" Roberts and Rebecca Roberts. Laborer in Kenton County in 1850. Farmer in Kenton County in 1860. Sheriff of Kenton County from 1861 to 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, p. 188A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, District 1, p.491.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Coker, p. 296B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058: Kenton County Marriages, p. 13.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1861,” in 1862 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1862), 143.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1862,” in 1863 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 24. (Frankfort, Ky.: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1863), 139.
Find A Grave, "Samuel F. Roberts (1823-1881)," Memorial 98755658, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/98755658/samuel-f_-roberts (accessed April 7, 2020).
